name: Snakawaii
description:
Snakawaii

Use the arrow keys to move the snakawaii around the grid collecting hearts, stars and rainbows. The more body parts that you have (that aren't rainbows) the more points you get.

  • Star slot — drop stars and collect points
  • Chop slot — chop off the trailing half of your snakawaii
  • Exit slot — TODO

NB—This game is currently incomplete, there's no end state and it's missing a lot of polish but it is, for all intents and purposes, a snake clone.

Controls
  • Movement — ⬅️ ⬆️ ⬇️ ➡️
  • Pause — Space
  • Restart on game over — Enter
Game Jam

This is an entry for the eighth Eggplant Community Game Jam #8 where the theme is "Snake clones".

Thanks

The lovely art is by Roboxel and is from Kawaii Game Icons. Thank you for adding them to the Bundle for Racial Justice and Equality! 🙏

This is the first time I've created a game with Godot so thank you to its creators and all the individuals who create and maintain the fine documentation! 👌
